thread.title: Raanta stops 22 shots as Rangers beat Sharks 4-0
thread.title_full: Raanta stops 22 shots as Rangers beat Sharks 4-0

title: Raanta stops 22 shots as Rangers beat Sharks 4-0
text:
> Top News Raanta stops 22 shots as Rangers beat Sharks 4-0 New York Rangers goalie Antti Raanta (32) stops a shot on the goal by San Jose Sharks' Patrick Marleau (12) as teammate Keith Yandle (93) defends during the first period of an NHL hockey game Monday, Oct. 19, 2015, in New York. (AP Photo/Frank Franklin II) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
